description: Compound is a decentralized blockchain protocol that allows users to lend or borrow selected cryptocurrencies. It establishes money markets by pooling assets together and algorithmically setting interest rates based on supply and demand of assets. COMP tokens are used for protocol governance.

zh.description: Compound 是个去中心化区块链协议，允许用户存入或借出协议支持的加密资产。Compound 通过资金池的方式来建立货币市场，并根据市场供需通过算法来调整利率。COMP 是其协议的治理代币。
